history.proof: intros m z a b H i j [H1 H2]. hauto lq: on use: Nat.lt_le_incl, Nat.le_trans, Nat.lt_irrefl, Nat.lt_le_trans, le_lt_or_eq.

original: intros m z a b H i j [H1 H2]. unfold diff_int. intros. red in H. specialize (H i j). assert (a <= i)%nat as Ha. auto with arith. assert (i < j <= b)%nat as H3. auto. apply (H Ha H3).
